song.englishname: O Come And Mourn With Me Awhile

english.segment1: O Come & Mourn With Me Awhile (Our Lord Is Crucified)
english.segment2: Words by Frederick W. Faber Music by Eric Ashley
english.segment3: O Come and Mourn with me awhile. O come near to the Savior's side. O come together, let us mourn. Jesus our lord is crucified
english.segment4: Seven times he spoke. Seven words of love. And all three hours, his silence cried. For mercy on the souls of men. Jesus our Lord is crucified
english.segment5: O Love of God O sin of man. In this dread act your strength is tried. And victory remains with love. Jesus our lord is crucified
english.segment6: O break, O break hard heart of mind. My weak self love and guilty pride. His Pilate and his Judas were. Jesus our lord is crucified
english.segment7: O love of god o sin of man. In this dread act your strength is tried. And victory remains in love. Jesus our lord is crucified
english.segment8: O Come and mourn with me awhile. A broken heart a fount of tears. Ask and they will not be denied. A broken heart love's cradle is. Jesus our Lord is crucified.
